item.title: South Korea’s climate pledge to cut coal, lower emissions clash with US push for LNG purchases
item.description: South Korea is chasing a coal-free future in efforts to slash carbon emissions, an ambitious goal for the fossil fuel-dependent country

item.title: Asian shares are mixed in quiet holiday trading after a lackluster post-Christmas day on Wall St
item.description: Asian shares are mixed after a lackluster post-Christmas session on Wall Street, despite a ratcheting up of tensions over Taiwan

item.title: Protesting students in Serbia urge support for early election they hope will oust Vucic
item.description: Protesting university students in Serbia have collected signatures throughout the country for their request for an early parliamentary election

item.title: Pilot dies in small plane crash off Copacabana beach in Brazil
item.description: Officials in Brazil say that a plane towing an advertising banner has crashed into the sea off Rio de Janeiro’s Copacabana beach

item.title: Myanmar holds first election since military seized power but critics say the vote is a sham
item.description: Voters in Myanmar have voted in the first phase of the country’s general election
